posts.title: abcdef
posts.description:
continued to expand with the establishment of private companies such as MICO (Motor Industries Company), which set up its manufacturing plant in the city.[67][68]

By the 1980s, urbanisation had spilled over the current boundaries, and in 1986, the Bangalore Metropolitan Region Development Authority, was established to co-ordinate the development of the entire region as a single unit.[66] On 8 February 1981, a major fire broke out at Venus Circus in Bangalore, where more than 92 people died
posts.author: sharath karant
